name: Fast & Furious Presents: Hobbs & Shaw (2019)
description: Lawman Luke Hobbs (Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson) and outcast Deckard Shaw (Jason Statham) form an unlikely alliance when a cyber-genetically enhanced villain threatens the future of humanity.
studio: Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham, Idris Elba

name: Avengers: Endgame (2019)
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies
studio: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo...

name: 6 Underground (2019)
description: Meet a new kind of action hero. Six untraceable agents, totally off the grid. They've buried their pasts so they can change the future.”
studio: Ryan Reynolds, Mélanie Laurent, Manuel Garcia...

name: Shazam! (2019)
description: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.
studio: Zachary Levi, Mark Strong, Asher Angel...

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018)
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man of his reality, crossing his path with five counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.
studio: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld...

name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World (2019)
description: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek The Hidden World, a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.
studio: Jay Baruchel, America Ferrera, F. Murray...

name: Bumblebee (2018)
description: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. On the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, Charlie Watson discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken.
studio: Hailee Steinfeld, Jorge Lendeborg Jr., John Cena...

name: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
description: An augmented human and Sarah Connor must stop an advanced liquid Terminator, from hunting down a young girl, whose fate is critical to the human race.

name: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil (2019)
description: Maleficent and her goddaughter Aurora begin to question the complex family ties that bind them as they are pulled in different directions by impending nuptials...
